questions.name: How long does it take to build a waste management website?
questions.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from strategy session to launch. This includes sustainability content development, design, compliance review, and testing.

questions.name: Do you work with waste companies outside Europe?
questions.answer: We specialize exclusively in European waste management companies to ensure deep understanding of GDPR, waste regulations, and circular economy requirements.

questions.name: What ROI can I expect?
questions.answer: Most clients see 120-200% increase in qualified commercial client inquiries within 90 days. Our average client secures 3-5 new municipal or corporate contracts within 6 months.

questions.name: Can you showcase our sustainability credentials?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in highlighting environmental impact through data visualization and sustainability reporting features.

questions.name: Can you integrate with our waste tracking systems?
questions.answer: We integrate with most major waste management software platforms for real-time reporting and customer portals.

questions.name: What happens after the website launches?
questions.answer: We provide training for your team, ongoing performance monitoring, and continuous optimization of your digital presence.
